channel.title: How would I change a start location?
channel.description:
Hey.
Could somebody help me change the starting location for players on a 508 please

item.title: How would I change a start location?
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

[quote=“dary3113, post:3, topic:336758”][quote author=VestaPK link=topic=433170.msg3179900#msg3179900 date=1271205860]
Change the Coords for the ::home command and any command taking you home and change the Coords in Player.java which is normally under a Public boolean.
[/quote]

The start location is completly different from the home location :/[/quote]

The statr location will still be in Player.java, find the Coords of the starting area and search them in Player.java (either x or y not both together) I can’t help further more since I’m going to bed Choaw.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I change a start location?

item.title: How would I change a start location?
item.dc:creator: @dary3113 dary3113
item.description:
@dary3113 wrote:

VestaPK:

Change the Coords for the ::home command and any command taking you home and change the Coords in Player.java which is normally under a Public boolean.

The start location is completly different from the home location

Read full topic
